Good Comments: Other groups have a RL too, and yet they seem to be fairly consistent with releases. But not SSF. It takes them 2 months for one episode.
Bad Comments: While I sincerely appreciate anyone who does the subbing for those of us who can't, SSS is just too hard for me to read.  I find myself constantly blinking and pausing to make sure I read it all.  The ones that I have read, the fonts are not big enough
